name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Official Level Design Contest 2022 - Round 1
summary:
Welcome to Round 1 of the 2022 SRB2 Official Level Design Contest. We hope you like trains.

Included are the contestant entries of the competition held by the SRB2 Forums.
Thanks to all our contestants! Have fun!

Single Player​:
- Bitter Brink Zone* - MarbleCheese
- Chaos Cove Zone glaber
- Egg Machine Zone - nickls2002
- Enchanted Enclave - Vixuzen
- Festung oder so - The Shadow
- Foliage Furnace Zone, Act 2 - Othius, Kanna, & Spectorious
- Freezer Folley Zone - FAVman33
- Hell Coaster Zone - Voidy2246
- Magma Laboratory Zone _ RoyKirbs
- Spiral Hill Pizza - Rogerregorroger
- SunkSea X Zone - Nuhu64
- Tarnish Ward Zone - Princess Plushima
- Yearning Yachtyard Zone - PhilJFou aka ChaRG
- Zaxel's Thunder Yard Zone, Act 2 - Zaxel Katsugyo

*May cause glitches with custom characters, especially using Automatic playstyle, during 2D sections

CTF​:
- Aquatic Territories Zone - Blast98
- Thunder Yard Arena Zone - Zaxel Katsugyo

Battle CTF​:
- Quartz Quadrant Zone - PeneBoi
- Radiant Forest CTF Zone - Radsla
- Space Metropolis Zone - InferNOr
